mapper.update: update mypage set infocontent = #{infocontent} where memidx = #{memidx} and infodate = #{infodate} and infotype = #{infotype}
mapper.select: select infocontent from mypage where memidx = #{arg0} and infodate = #{arg1} and infotype = #{arg2}

SELECT carry.CRNAME as crname , memidx, payname , paynum , date_format(paydate,'%Y-%m-%d') as paydate , payprice FROM gymcarry.payment join carry where memidx = ${memidx} and carry.cridx = payment.cridx ORDER BY paydate DESC ;

select cridx, crnick, placeidx, placename, proprice, crcerti1, crcerti2, crcerti3, crcerti4, crcerti5, procount from carry natural join crcertification natural join crprice natural join place where procount=1 and cridx in (SELECT cridx FROM gymcarry.likelist where memidx = ${memidx} and LIKECHECK = '1');
select MEMIDX,MEMPHOTO,MEMNAME, MEMEMAIL, MEMPW, MEMNICK, MEMPHONE,MEMBIRTH from member where memidx = ${MEMIDX};
select infocontent,infotype from mypage where memidx = #{arg0} and infodate = #{arg1} ORDER BY FIELD(infotype, 'photo','food', 'kg','memo') DESC, infotype ASC;
